channel.title: Comments on: Bunker Hill: A Desperate Race of Men

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded: When people bandy about video directors, there’s a lot of talk about Mark Romanek, Spike Jonze, and of course David Fincher, bless ’em all. But who or what, in my humble estimation, can compare to Larry Harnisch and his A Walk in Old Los Angeles?
